web_snippets: Ray Smith, Microsoft, University College Dublin, About, Driving the future of AI-powered business applications with a passion for innovation.
As a passionate product leader, Ray Smith has built businesses, teams, and products that have innovated and driven product-led growth.
Ray Smith is the VP, Sustainability and Supply Chain at Microsoft . Additionally, Ray Smith has had 4 past jobs including Co-founder & CEO at Datahug .
